text: Bix Beiderbecke (March 10, 1903 â€“ August 6, 1931) was an American jazz performer and pianist who was highly influential in the 1920s. He was very popular among other celebrities. He was born in Davenport, Iowa; he died, age twenty-eight in Queens, New York due to lobar pneumonia. title: Bix Beiderbecke
